mapper.insert: INSERT INTO feedback ( feedback_num, user_id, original_filename, saved_filename, file_path, gpt_feedback, feedback_date, job_title ) VALUES ( 'FB' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(feedback_seq.NEXTVAL, 4, '0'), #{userId}, #{originalFileName}, #{savedFileName}, #{filePath}, #{gptFeedback}, SYSDATE, #{jobTitle} )
